txt.en:
'It must be there still! The Orcs may have taken it -- or the tree when it took me -- but I think not. It was hidden well, and they would have to dig deep to find it, I am sure.

'What? Helvorlim, my family's heirloom sword, of course! It is the token of my birthright.

'I am not yet strong enough to fight the Orcs... will you enter Thornhope and search for Helvorlim? I will make it worth your while!'
'Ah yes, this is it! You have found Helvorlim! With this sword, I will bring my vengeance down upon the heads of the Orcs!'
Thane Béortnoth was rendered half-mad, following the Orcs' assault on Thornhope.
Search for Helvorlim, the heirloom sword of Béortnoth's family
Helvorlim should be in a coffer or box somewhere in Thornhope.\n\nThane Béortnoth has asked you to find Helvorlim, his family's heirloom sword.
Thane Béortnoth is encamped outside of Thornhope.\n\nYou should bring Helvorlim to Béortnoth at once.
